channel.title: Hobby Posts on Yoshihio Obata
channel.description: Recent content in Hobby Posts on Yoshihio Obata

item.title: Paper Art - Climbing x Synchrotron Microtomography
item.description: This is the first part in my series where I make a piece of art based on my most recent publication. This is also the image you see in the banner of this site! I made this piece after writing my first paper, the review paper about synchrotron microtomography in bone because at the time I was very interested in climbing. It’s very simple and a bit amateurish, but I have a strong attachment to this picture because it combines two of the things I discovered and learned about after coming to Utah from North Carolina.
